name: R4B-Extension-R5-Extension
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Extension into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `Extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Extension`
R4B `Extension.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Extension.extension`
R4B `Extension.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Extension.id`

element.display: identifies the meaning of the extension

target.display: identifies the meaning of the extension
target.comment: R4B `Extension.url` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Extension.url`

R4B `Extension.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Extension.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `integer` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `positiveInt` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `unsignedInt` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R4B value[x] Contributor has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 value[x]
